messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Cinder in St. Louis
messages.msgSnippet: HELLO!!  Could you e-mail me direct?  natureswayeatraw@yahoo.com  I really really need to talk to someone about the ex-hubby thing??  I am going through some
messages.messageBody:
HELLO!! Could you e-mail me direct? natureswayeatraw@... I really really need to talk to someone about the ex-hubby thing?? I am going through some issues with this and was wondering how you are handling it?

Thanks,

ac

Cinder Wilkinson <cinder@...> wrote:
Hi,

I'm new to this group, though not new to the idea of unschooling, and I
saw something mentioned about a conference in October in St. Louis.
I'd really be interested in finding out more about that, especially
since I live in St. Louis! The problem I'm having getting started in
homeschool/unschooling my 13 and 10 year olds is their father, my
ex-husband. Perhaps if I could get him to learn a little more about
it, he would be more open to the idea.

Thanks-
Cinder in St. Louis
